MCGS.QA.summary: Medicare Group Q.P.S.C. provides health care services in Qatar. The company operates a hospital and medical clinic center; and promotes medical services. It also provides home nursing and physical therapy services, as well as specializes in nutrition services. The company was formerly known as Al Ahli Specialised Hospital Company Q.P.S.C. Medicare Group Q.P.S.C. was founded in 1996 and is based in Doha, Qatar.
